notes: Room allocations and some session details are marked TBC in the information pack and should be confirmed closer to the event date.

A small number of sections in the information pack appear to contain legacy content (e.g., non-Greek currency references). This app avoids repeating those elements and instead links to the official booking portals.
local_tips: English is widely spoken in tourist areas and hotels.
For airport–city travel: Metro Line 3, Express bus X95 (Syntagma), or taxi.
